Subject: 23. Content Sniffing Not Disabled
Description:
AIC 11.5

Impact:
HTTP headers which should be included by default. Methods for modifying or removing the
headers for specific instances should be provided, but by default there are secure settings
which should be enabled unless there are other overriding concerns.

Recommendation:
Add the X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff header to the web server.

References:
Industry Standard:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-Content-Type-Options
https://wiki.owasp.org/index.php/OWASP_Secure_Headers_Project#xcto

Steps to Reproduce:
Verify the response headers for X-Content type options.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Verify the response headers for X-Content type options.
